assets.name: Knight
assets.prompt:
Generate an RPG-JS class file for the "Knight" class (ID: knight).

Description: Frontline tank and physical damage dealer. Highest HP and ATK. Lowest AGI and INT.

Stat progression (for reference in comments only — stats go on @Actor, not @Class):
- HP: base 45, growth +14.5/level
- SP: base 15, growth +3.2/level
- ATK: base 12, growth +3.3/level
- INT: base 5, growth +1/level
- DEF: base 10, growth +3.1/level
- AGI: base 7, growth +1.5/level
Level cap: 30

Skill unlock IDs: SK-KN-01, SK-KN-02, SK-KN-03, SK-KN-04, SK-KN-05, SK-KN-06, SK-KN-07

IMPORTANT: @Class does NOT have a "parameters" property. Stat curves belong to @Actor.
Set id, name, description on the @Class decorator.
Set skillsToLearn as an empty array (skill files are generated separately).
Add TODO comments listing each skill with its unlock level and import path.
Do NOT use string IDs for skills — they must be class imports (leave as TODOs).
Do NOT use: parameters, startingEquipment, expCurve, initialLevel, finalLevel — these belong to @Actor.
Include the stat progression as a comment block for documentation purposes.
Export the class as default.

assets.name: Cleric
assets.prompt:
Generate an RPG-JS class file for the "Cleric" class (ID: cleric).

Description: Pure support and healer. Highest SP for sustained casting. Strong INT for heal power.

- HP: base 35, growth +10/level
- SP: base 25, growth +5.5/level
- ATK: base 7, growth +1.5/level
- INT: base 12, growth +3.3/level
- DEF: base 9, growth +2.5/level

Include the stat progression as a comment block for documentation purposes.
Export the class as default.

assets.name: Mage
assets.prompt:

assets.name: Rogue
assets.prompt:
Generate an RPG-JS class file for the "Rogue" class (ID: rogue).

Description: Speed-based damage dealer. Highest AGI, always acts first. Evasion-based survival.

Stat progression (for reference in comments only — stats go on @Actor, not @Class):
- HP: base 32, growth +8.5/level
- SP: base 20, growth +4.5/level
- ATK: base 10, growth +2.5/level
- INT: base 6, growth +1.3/level
- DEF: base 7, growth +1.5/level
- AGI: base 13, growth +3.3/level
